welcome: Welcome {name}. Here are the commands currently available: ğŸ” â€¢ /search - Search for a player. ğŸ†” - /id - Shows the statistics of a player with the specified ID ğŸ‘¤ â€¢ /me - Shows the statistics of the player set as default ğŸŒ â€¢ /language - Change the language of the bot.
language_description: Change the language of the bot
me_description: Shows the statistics of the player set as default
id_description: Shows the statistics of a player with the specified ID
search_usage: Use the /search command to search for a player. Example: /search nickoehler
player_id_usage: Use the /id command to show the statistics of a player with the specified ID. Example: /id 2316541
length_error: The search query must be between 2 and 32 characters
generic_error: An error occurred: {error} If you want to help development, open a detailed issue on how to reproduce the error you encountered. Before opening a new issue, check that it has not already been reported.
no_ranked_data: This player has not played any ranked games yet
no_team_data: This player has not played any ranked team games yet
no_clan_data: This player is not in a clan anymore
player_me_error: You need to set a player as default to use this command
